actions.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 239 (Roll no. 171).

description: Amendment sought to require a study on the health impacts of increased air pollution in communities surrounding the refineries that will transport diluted bitumen through the proposed Keystone XL pipeline.
purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-88 to require a study on the health impacts of increased air pollution in communities surrounding the refineries that will transport diluted bitumen through the proposed Keystone XL pipeline.
